description: Level B conformance with Part 1 of the PDF/A ISO standard [ISO 19005-1:2005] indicates minimal compliance with the ISO 19005-1 standard for a constrained form of Adobe PDF version 1.4, intended to be suitable for long-term preservation of page-oriented documents for which PDF is already being used in practice.
name: ISO 19005-1. Document management - Electronic document file format for long-term preservation - Part 1: Use of PDF 1.4, Level B Conformance (PDF/A-1a)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">pdf</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
